name: Linden Wood "Subduing Seat" Backed Chair
description: A backed chair with comfy armrests and soft cushioning. It can be found in the Duke's office in the Fortress of Meropide. According to the schematics, this chair can help to standardize one's sitting posture, effectively decreasing the risk of back injury. However, some people don't like this sort of chair, because the sight of your boss sitting up straight can be quite intimidating...
